languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс бросает на вас змеиный взгляд.{/n} "Нет. Бога-Императора ради, {name}, ты не видел{mf||а}, какими цветами переливается пустота между звездой и планетой? Ты желаешь такой же участи иным мирам?!"

{n}Heinrix turns his livid gaze on you.{/n} "No. For the God-Emperor's sake, {name}, didn't you see the lurid shimmering of the void between the star and the planet? Do you wish this same fate upon other worlds?"
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс бросает на вас змеиный взгляд.{/n} "Нет. Бога-Императора ради, {name}, ты не видел{mf||а}, какими цветами переливается пустота между звездой и планетой? Ты желаешь такой же участи иным мирам?!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix turns his livid gaze on you.{/n} "No. For the God-Emperor's sake, {name}, didn't you see the lurid shimmering of the void between the star and the planet? Do you wish this same fate upon other worlds?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix turns his livid gaze on you.{/n} "No. For the God-Emperor's sake, {name}, didn't you see the lurid shimmering of the void between the star and the planet? Do you wish this same fate upon other worlds?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix turns his livid gaze on you.{/n} "No. For the God-Emperor's sake, {name}, didn't you see the lurid shimmering of the void between the star and the planet? Do you wish this same fate upon other worlds?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix turns his livid gaze on you.{/n} "No. For the God-Emperor's sake, {name}, didn't you see the lurid shimmering of the void between the star and the planet? Do you wish this same fate upon other worlds?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}海因里希脸色铁青地盯着你。{/n}“看在神皇的份上，别这样，{name}。你难道没看到，恒星与行星之间的虚空正散发着恐怖的光芒吗？你希望别的世界也落得同样的下场吗？”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix turns his livid gaze on you.{/n} "No. For the God-Emperor's sake, {name}, didn't you see the lurid shimmering of the void between the star and the planet? Do you wish this same fate upon other worlds?"

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希脸色铁青地盯着你。{/n}“看在神皇的份上，别这样，{name}。你难道没看到，恒星与行星之间的虚空正散发着恐怖的光芒吗？你希望别的世界也落得同样的下场吗？”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix dirige su mirada cargada de furia hacia ti.{/n} «No. Por el amor del Dios Emperador, {name}, ¿es que no ha visto el brillo nefasto en el vacío entre la estrella y el planeta? ¿Le desea el mismo destino a otros mundos?».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix turns his livid gaze on you.{/n} "No. For the God-Emperor's sake, {name}, didn't you see the lurid shimmering of the void between the star and the planet? Do you wish this same fate upon other worlds?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix dirige su mirada cargada de furia hacia ti.{/n} «No. Por el amor del Dios Emperador, {name}, ¿es que no ha visto el brillo nefasto en el vacío entre la estrella y el planeta? ¿Le desea el mismo destino a otros mundos?».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスはあなたにギラギラした視線を向ける。{/n}「いいえ。神帝陛下のために。{name}さん、星と惑星の間の虚空の怪しげなきらめきを見ませんでしたか？陛下は他の惑星にも同じ運命を望みますか？」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix turns his livid gaze on you.{/n} "No. For the God-Emperor's sake, {name}, didn't you see the lurid shimmering of the void between the star and the planet? Do you wish this same fate upon other worlds?"

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスはあなたにギラギラした視線を向ける。{/n}「いいえ。神帝陛下のために。{name}さん、星と惑星の間の虚空の怪しげなきらめきを見ませんでしたか？陛下は他の惑星にも同じ運命を望みますか？」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix pose son regard livide sur vous.{/n} « Non. Pour l'amour de l'Empereur-Dieu, {name}, n'avez-vous pas vu le sinistre miroitement du vide qui sépare l'étoile de la planète ? Vous souhaitez condamner d'autres mondes au même sort ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix turns his livid gaze on you.{/n} "No. For the God-Emperor's sake, {name}, didn't you see the lurid shimmering of the void between the star and the planet? Do you wish this same fate upon other worlds?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix pose son regard livide sur vous.{/n} « Non. Pour l'amour de l'Empereur-Dieu, {name}, n'avez-vous pas vu le sinistre miroitement du vide qui sépare l'étoile de la planète ? Vous souhaitez condamner d'autres mondes au même sort ? »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix richtet seinen verärgerten Blick auf dich.{/n} "Nein. Beim Imperator, {name}, habt ihr denn das unheilvolle Schimmern der Leere zwischen dem Stern und dem Planeten nicht gesehen? Wünscht Ihr dasselbe Schicksal auch anderen Welten?"
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix turns his livid gaze on you.{/n} "No. For the God-Emperor's sake, {name}, didn't you see the lurid shimmering of the void between the star and the planet? Do you wish this same fate upon other worlds?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix richtet seinen verärgerten Blick auf dich.{/n} "Nein. Beim Imperator, {name}, habt ihr denn das unheilvolle Schimmern der Leere zwischen dem Stern und dem Planeten nicht gesehen? Wünscht Ihr dasselbe Schicksal auch anderen Welten?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, öfke dolu gözlerini sana çeviriyor.{/n} "Hayır. Tanrı İmparator aşkına {name}, yıldızla gezegen arasındaki titrek ve solgun uçsuz parıltısını görmedin mi? Aynı şey başka dünyaların da mı başına gelsin istiyorsun?"
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix turns his livid gaze on you.{/n} "No. For the God-Emperor's sake, {name}, didn't you see the lurid shimmering of the void between the star and the planet? Do you wish this same fate upon other worlds?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix öfke dolu gözlerini sana çeviriyor.{/n} "Hayır. Tanrı İmparator aşkına {name}, yıldızın ve gezegenin arasında uçsuzun titrek ve solgun parıltısını görmedin mi? Aynı şey başka dünyaların da mı başına gelsin istiyorsun?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
